# 深度强化学习综述：兼论计算机围棋的发展

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-jianlun-jisuanji-weiqi-de-fazhan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-jianlun-jisuanji-weiqi-de-fazhan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-jianlun-jisuanji-weiqi-de-fazhan
shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-jianlun-jisuanji-weiqi-de-fazhan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-jianlun-jisuanji-weiqi-de-fazhan
shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-jianlun-jisuanji-weiqi-de-fazhan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
